languages.text: "Ирлиэт, нужно ли мне тебя в чем-то убеждать? Может быть, попробуешь поверить не своему надзирателю, а собственной интуиции? Той самой, что говорит тебе не верить всему, что болтает Муаран?"

traits.locale_text: "Ирлиэт, нужно ли мне тебя в чем-то убеждать? Может быть, попробуешь поверить не своему надзирателю, а собственной интуиции? Той самой, что говорит тебе не верить всему, что болтает Муаран?"

languages.text: "Yrliet, do I need to convince you? Maybe you can try trusting your own intuition instead of your overseer? You know, that thing that's telling you not to believe everything Muaran says?"
languages.original_text: "Ирлиэт, нужно ли мне тебя в чем-то убеждать? Может быть, попробуешь поверить не своему надзирателю, а собственной интуиции? Той самой, что говорит тебе не верить всему, что болтает Муаран?"

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, do I need to convince you? Maybe you can try trusting your own intuition instead of your overseer? You know, that thing that's telling you not to believe everything Muaran says?"
"Yrliet, do I need to convince you? Maybe you can try trusting your own intuition instead of your overseer? You know, that thing that's telling you not to believe everything Muaran says?"
"Yrliet, do I need to convince you? Maybe you can try trusting your own intuition instead of your overseer? You know, that thing that's telling you not to believe everything Muaran says?"
"Yrliet, do I need to convince you? Maybe you can try trusting your own intuition instead of your overseer? You know, that thing that's telling you not to believe everything Muaran says?"

languages.text: “我需要说服你吗，伊莉耶特？或许你可以试着相信自己的直觉，不要总是相信你的导师？我的意思是说，不要总相信穆兰说的一切，你明白吧？”
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, do I need to convince you? Maybe you can try trusting your own intuition instead of your overseer? You know, that thing that's telling you not to believe everything Muaran says?"

traits.locale_text: “我需要说服你吗，伊莉耶特？或许你可以试着相信自己的直觉，不要总是相信你的导师？我的意思是说，不要总相信穆兰说的一切，你明白吧？”

languages.text: 「ユリエット、説得が必要か？司祭の目じゃなくて自分の持っている直感を信じられるだろう？そう、お前はムアランの言葉すべてを信じてはいないんだろう？」
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, do I need to convince you? Maybe you can try trusting your own intuition instead of your overseer? You know, that thing that's telling you not to believe everything Muaran says?"

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエット、説得が必要か？司祭の目じゃなくて自分の持っている直感を信じられるだろう？そう、お前はムアランの言葉すべてを信じてはいないんだろう？」

languages.text: "Yrliet, muss ich Euch wirklich überzeugen? Vielleicht solltet Ihr Eurem eigenen Instinkt vertrauen und nicht Eurem Aufpasser. Ihr wisst schon, dieses Ding, das Euch sagt, nicht alles zu glauben, was Muaran erzählt."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, do I need to convince you? Maybe you can try trusting your own intuition instead of your overseer? You know, that thing that's telling you not to believe everything Muaran says?"

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, muss ich Euch wirklich überzeugen? Vielleicht solltet Ihr Eurem eigenen Instinkt vertrauen und nicht Eurem Aufpasser. Ihr wisst schon, dieses Ding, das Euch sagt, nicht alles zu glauben, was Muaran erzählt."

languages.text: « Yrliet, ai-je vraiment besoin de vous convaincre ? Ne pouvez-vous pas essayer de vous fier à votre intuition ? Vous savez, cette petite voix dans votre tête qui vous dit de ne pas croire tout ce que raconte Muaran ? »
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, do I need to convince you? Maybe you can try trusting your own intuition instead of your overseer? You know, that thing that's telling you not to believe everything Muaran says?"

traits.locale_text: « Yrliet, ai-je vraiment besoin de vous convaincre ? Ne pouvez-vous pas essayer de vous fier à votre intuition ? Vous savez, cette petite voix dans votre tête qui vous dit de ne pas croire tout ce que raconte Muaran ? »

languages.text: «Yrliet, ¿tengo que convencerte? ¿No puedes confiar en tu propia intuición en lugar de en tu supervisor? Ya sabes, eso que te dice que no te creas todo lo que cuenta Muaran».
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, do I need to convince you? Maybe you can try trusting your own intuition instead of your overseer? You know, that thing that's telling you not to believe everything Muaran says?"

traits.locale_text: «Yrliet, ¿tengo que convencerte? ¿No puedes confiar en tu propia intuición en lugar de en tu supervisor? Ya sabes, eso que te dice que no te creas todo lo que cuenta Muaran».

languages.text: "Yrliet, seni ikna etmem mi gerekiyor? Gözetmeninden ziyade kendi sezgilerine güvenmeyi deneyemez misin? Sezgilerin sana Muaran'ın dediği her şeye inanmaman gerektiğini anlatmıyor mu?"
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, do I need to convince you? Maybe you can try trusting your own intuition instead of your overseer? You know, that thing that's telling you not to believe everything Muaran says?"

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, seni ikna etmem mi gerekiyor? Gözetmeninden ziyade kendi sezgilerine güvenmeyi deneyemez misin? Sezgilerin sana Muaran'ın dediği her şeye inanmaman gerektiğini anlatmıyor mu?"
